AN EXPERIENCE DEDICATED TO YOU
Towering, oak-lined roads, endless sunshine, soft, warm breezes and extraordinary personal service – that is what awaits you at
Heathrow Country Club
, where we have over 30 years of creating spectacular events! We pride ourselves on our marvelous grounds, food and service. Heathrow was designed to accommodate events of all sizes. Inside of the main clubhouse are the Main Dining Room, the Terrace, the Grill, a boardroom, and the Main Lounge. Cathedral-height ceilings with exposed beams, a massive fireplace, and floor-to-ceiling windows with spectacular views are some of the main attributes of this beautiful location. In a private building directly next to the Clubhouse are the Grand Ballroom with attached foyer and the private Ceremony Gardens. With enough space to host up to 250 guests at a time, these spaces also provide events with plenty of natural and bright lighting, crystal chandeliers, and an attached covered patio.
At
The Legacy Club at Alaqua Lakes,
the scenic and naturally preserved setting can provide the perfect backdrop for any special occasion. We strive to create memorable events by providing wonderful food & beverage selections, beautiful amenities, world-class service and more. Our professional staff can assist you in creating the customized event of your dreams. Audio-visual equipment is available upon request to ensure your meetings and events are not only immersive but professional. Nearby the Legacy Club is the new Athletic Center with a pool deck that can accommodate up to 200 guests for events of all kinds. You are looking for not just any venue, but an unforgettable experience for you and your guests. We are an award-winning wedding and event venue.
Sophisticated.
Breathtaking.
Timeless.
Weddings & Receptions
MEETINGS AND EVENTS
Whether you are hosting a large Corporate Meeting or a small bridal shower we have the right space and menu for you. You can order from our amazing and unique catering menu or we can create a customized menu just for your event. Heathrow Country Club and The Legacy Club have proudly hosted events of all kinds over the past 30 years. From meetings to mitzvahs, we can customize a menu to meet even your wildest expectations.
PLEASE CONSIDER OUR VENUES FOR:
Corporate meetings  |  Christmas parties  |  Bar and bat mitzvahs  |  Bridal showers  |  Baby showers  |  Engagement parties  |  Rehearsal dinners  |  Birthday parties  |  And so many more!
AMENITIES INCLUDE:
Audio Visual
Complimentary WiFi
Individual Climate Control in Every Room
Breakout Rooms – Separate Dining/Meeting Spaces
Meetings & Events

Heathrow, FL 32746

CONTACT LEGACY

Home About Us Contact Us Affiliated Clubs Careers Membership Plan an Event Weddings Meetings and Special Events Blog Gallery Golf Score Cards Golf Experience Junior Golf Golf Outings Club Life Tennis Spring Fling Tennis Tournament Tennis and Sports Camp Dining and Social Events Aquatics Fitness Youth Menu Home About Us Contact Us Affiliated Clubs Careers Membership Plan an Event Weddings Meetings and Special Events Blog Gallery Golf Score Cards Golf Experience Junior Golf Golf Outings Club Life Tennis Spring Fling Tennis Tournament Tennis and Sports Camp Dining and Social Events Aquatics Fitness Youth Member Login Member Login ABOUT US At Heathrow Legacy Club, there is a warm, gracious welcome waiting for you. The Garl course, a lush, green fairway with your name on it. Also featuring a Tom Fazio design, added to the fold in 2013, our product is unique to Central Florida. Offering 36 Championship golf holes, dining, and a full aquatic, tennis and fitness facility! Established over 35 years ago, Heathrow Legacy is one of Central Florida’s most prestigious private country clubs. Here, you’ll find towering oak-lined roads, endless sunshine, soft, warm breezes and extraordinary personal service. As one of only a few country clubs that boasts golf, tennis, aquatic, and fitness facilities, Heathrow is the ideal place for bettering your lifestyle. Members quickly discover for themselves a rewarding atmosphere designed for play, relaxation, and renewal. Featuring 36 holes of championship golf, premier tennis, a sparkling 6 lane competitive-style swimming pool, unmatched athletic center, award-winning dining and a Grand Ballroom, there’s everything you could ever want, and then some. Heathrow Legacy isn't merely a country club, but an extraordinary refuge dedicated to the art of living. It's a lifestyle.
